panels.content:
# SLAs
SLAs are calculated on a monthly basis.

1. 99% Openstack API Uptime
2. 99% Openstack API non 5xx backend errors
3. Average API Response Time under 8 Seconds
4. 99.99% VM uptime

See the below chart for details on how much downtime each percentage equals.

| Percentage | Yearly         | Monthly           | Weekly |
|:-------------:|:-------------:|:-------------:|:-------------:|
|99%|3.65 days| 7.2 hours| 1.68 hours|
|99.5%|1.83 days|3.6 hours|50.4 minutes|
|99.9%|8.76 hours|43.2 minutes|10.1 minutes|
|99.95%|4.38 hours|21.56 minutes|5.04 minutes|
|99.99%|52.56 minutes|4.32 minutes|1.01 minutes|

# API Current Status

APIs marked as "Good" and in green have a current 10 minute average response time of below 5000 milliseconds. 

APIs marked as "Degraded" and in orange have a current 10 minute average response time of above 5000 seconds and below 10000 milliseconds.

APIs marked as "Unusable" and in red have a current 10 minute average response time above 10000 milliseconds.

# Horizon Current Status

Horizon marked as "Good" and in green have a current 10 minute average response time of below 8 seconds. 

Horizon marked as "Degraded" and in orange have a current 10 minute average response time of above 8 seconds and below 12 seconds.

Horizon marked as "Unusable" and in red have a current 10 minute average response time above 12 seconds.
